mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your sense of entitlement is our top priority! Get exclusive perks and rewards just for being you!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was at a fancy restaurant, ready to order my usual extravagant meal. But as I glanced at the menu, I noticed they had the audacity to remove my favorite lobster dish. Outraged, I stood up and demanded to speak with the chef personally. I stormed into the kitchen, causing a scene as I expressed my disappointment and disbelief that they could make such a decision without consulting me first. The chef, taken aback by my entitlement, scrambled to explain their reasoning, but I wasn't having any of it. I insisted they prepare the lobster dish just for me, regardless of the menu changes. After much commotion, the chef reluctantly agreed, and I savored every bite of my beloved meal, feeling completely justified in my entitlement. After all, when you're Hot Josh, you deserve nothing but the best!
